summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of land and other property for playground purposes (Rainier Beach Villa Tracts) contemplated by Ordinance 86042, King County Cause No. 508522, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor and authorizing the purchase thereof by City Employees' Retirement and Pension System.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
